testsuite.name: asset.pipeline.grails.fs.SpringResourceAssetResolverSpec

testcase.name: Test that the getAsset method resolves an AssetFile instance
Test that the getAssets method resolves all AssetFile instances
Test that the scanForResources method scans and locates AssetFile instances
